sentence.Network_en: They are willing to sign away their entire worldly possessions.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们愿意签字放弃所有财产。

sentence.Network_en: All his worldly goods were packed into a neat checked carrier bag.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的所有家当都装在一个干净的方格图案手提袋里。

entry.def: Worldly is used to describe things relating to the ordinary activities of life, rather than to spiritual things.

example.ex: I think it is time you woke up and focused your thoughts on more worldly matters...
example.tran: 我认为是该你清醒过来把思想集中到更为现实的问题上的时候了。

example.ex: He has repeatedly criticized Western churches as too worldly and too entrenched in consumerism.
example.tran: 他一再批评西方教会过于世俗，消费主义观念过于顽固。

entry.def: Someone who is worldly is experienced and knows about the practical or social aspects of life.

example.ex: He was different from anyone I had known, very worldly, everything that Dermot was not...
example.tran: 他不同于我认识的任何一个人，非常老成，与德莫特完全相反。

entry.def: Worldly is used to describe things relating to success, wealth, and possessions.

example.ex: Today the media drive athletes to the view that the important thing is to gain worldly success.
example.tran: 现在，媒体使得运动员认为追名逐利是很重要的。

entry.def: You can refer to someone's possessions as their worldly goods or possessions.

example.ex: ...a man who had given up all his worldly goods...
example.tran: 放弃了所有财产的男子

example.ex: They are willing to sign away their entire worldly possessions.
example.tran: 他们愿意签字放弃所有财产。

means.word_mean: 1. characteristic of or devoted to the temporal world;
2. very sophisticated especially because of surfeit; versed in the ways of the world;

sentences.sentence: "the blase traveler refers to the ocean he has crossed as `the pond'"

means.word_mean: 3. concerned with secular rather than sacred matters;

means.word_mean: 世上的,尘世的,物质世界的

sentences.en: Are spiritual or worldly values more important?
sentences.cn: 精神上的价值重要, 还是物质的价值重要呢?

sentences.en: She forsook her worldly possessions to devote herself to the church.
sentences.cn: 她抛弃世上的财物而献身教会。
